source: Tūkstantinės minios panika Centriniame parke griuvus barjerui
translation_clean: The crowd of thousands panicked in the Central Park after the fence collapsed.
reference: Thousands in Central Park panic after barrier collapse

source: Tūkstančiai žmonių, supanikavusių dėl galimų šūvių politinio pobūdžio renginyje, pasileido bėgti Centriniu parku sugriuvus policijos barjerui.
translation_clean: Thousands of people, panicked about possible shots of a political nature at the event, started to run away through Central Park after the police barrier collapsed.
reference: The collapse of a police barrier sent thousands of people fleeing in a panic in Central Park, afraid of possible gunshots at a politically-charged show.

source: Žinomos asmenybės – Demokratų partijai atstovaujantis Niujorko gubernatorius Andrew Cuomo’as, Respublikonų senatorius Jeffas Flake’as, Janeta Jackson, Johnas Legendas – paragino žiūrovus įsitraukti į audringą šalies politiką.
translation_clean:
Translated text:

Well-known personalities - New York Governor Andrew Cuomo representing the Democratic Party, Republican Senator Jeff Flake, Janet Jackson, John Legend - called on viewers to get involved in the turbulent domestic politics.

Note: The translation is quite literal, but it's worth noting that the original text seems to be a summary or a quote from a TV show or a news program, possibly a US-based one, given the mention of US politicians and celebrities. The translation might not fully capture the nuances and context of the original text.
reference: Big-name personalities from Democratic New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo and Republican Sen. Jeff Flake to Janet Jackson and John Legend urged spectators to get involved in the nation's troubled politics.

source: Nugriuvus barjerui šeštadienio vakarą vykusiame renginyje, valdžios institucijos greitai patikino žiūrovus, kad jie yra saugūs.
translation_clean:
Breaking through the barrier on Saturday evening at the event, government institutions quickly reassured the viewers that they are safe.

Note: The translation is quite literal, and the sentence structure might not be as natural in English as it is in Lithuanian. A more idiomatic translation could be:

After a barrier was breached on Saturday evening at the event, authorities quickly moved to reassure the public that everyone was safe.
reference: Authorities quickly assured the crowd they were safe after the barrier fell Saturday evening.

source: Saulėtą popietę prasidėjusiame renginyje daugiausia kalbėta apie socialinį teisingumą.
translation_clean: The sunny afternoon at the beginning of the event was mainly about social justice.
reference: Burning social justice issues dominated the event that started on a sunny afternoon.

source: Maždaug 60 000 stebėtojų susirinko į Didžiojoje pievoje vykusį Visuotinį piliečių festivalį, kuriame turėjo pasirodyti Cardi B, The Weeknd ir kitos popžvaigždės.
translation_clean: Approximately 60,000 spectators gathered at the Big Meadow for the Universal Citizens Festival, where Cardi B, The Weeknd, and other pop stars were scheduled to perform.
reference: About 60,000 people filled the park's Great Lawn for the Global Citizen Festival, also awaiting Cardi B, The Weeknd and other pop stars.

source: Kai kurie kalbėjusieji paprašė žiūrovų paskambinti jiems atstovaujantiems Kongreso nariams ir pareikšti nuomonę apie šią savaitę vykusius Senato posėdžius dėl kandidato į Aukščiausiąjį teismą Bretto Kavanaugh‘o.
translation_clean: Some of the speakers asked viewers to call their representatives in Congress and express their opinion about the Senate sessions this week regarding the Supreme Court candidate Brett Kavanaugh.
reference: Some speakers asked the audience to call their Congress members to react to this week's Senate hearings for Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh.

source: Nepertraukiama Alastairo Seeley’o pergalių serija „British Supersport“ lenktynėse Asene

reference: Alastair Seeley took his third win in five British Supersport races by taking victory in Saturday's 12-lap sprint race at Assen in the Netherlands.

source: Lenktynininkas iš Karikferguso 0,05 sek. aplenkė „Yamaha“ vairuojantį Jacką Kennedy.

The translation of the Lithuanian text to English is:

The driver from Carrickfergus 0.05 seconds beat "Yamaha" driving Jack Kennedy.

source: „Be Wiser Ducati“ vairuojantis Glennas Irwinas, bandantis pakilti aukščiau dabartinės ketvirtos vietos čempionato reitinguose, dviejuose sekmadienio „British Superbike“ lenktynių kvalifikaciniuose važiavimuose buvo ketvirtas.

translation_clean: Almost 3,000 people signed the online petition hoping it would be awarded or recognized.

reference: Mrs Ognissanti said it was an "honour" to be thought of so highly.

translation_clean:
According to Bedford Mayor Dave Hodgson, p. Ognissanti with children and grandchildren was invited to his office to view the city's treasures and historical artifacts, and to taste the mayor's tea.

source: „Lina Bedforfe užima ypatingą vietą, o jos kioskas yra miesto centro dalis“, – teigė jis.

The translation of the Lithuanian text to English is:

“Lina Bedforde occupies a special place, and her queue is part of the city center,” he said.

source: Džiaugiuosi, kad ji priėmė mano kvietimą, ir labai laukiu mūsų susitikimo mano kabinete, kad galėčiau padėkoti Linai už darbą mūsų mieste.“

source: Išgirdęs apie priėmimą, kurį planuojama surengti iki metų pabaigos, jis teigė: „Labai džiaugiuosi dėl Linos, nes ji to nusipelnė dėl savo puikaus charakterio.“

Upon hearing about the award, which is planned to be held by the end of the year, he said: "I am very happy about Lina, because she deserved it due to her excellent character."

source: Kelyje su Alsterio „Lambretta“ klubu

reference: Rolling with the Ulster Lambretta Club

translation_clean:
The motorcyclists "Lambretta" were the unchanging satellites of the 7th decade's fashion culture.

The Lambretta motorcyclists were the unchanging satellites of the 1950s fashion culture.

The word "7-ojo dešimtmečio" in Lithuanian translates to "7th decade" which refers to the 1950s.

source: Grupė itališkojo motorolerio gerbėjų bando išsaugoti tų laikų dvasią.

reference: The spirit of that era is being kept alive by a group of enthusiasts of the Italian motor scooter.

source: Praėjus 70 metų po pirmojo Alsterio „Lambretta“ klubo įkūrimo, šį savaitgalį Fermanos apygardoje susirinko maždaug 100 motorolerių mėgėjų iš Jungtinės Karalystės ir Airijos.
translation_clean: Seventy years after the first Alsterio "Lambretta" club was founded, this weekend around 100 scooter enthusiasts from the United Kingdom and Ireland gathered in the Fermanagh region.
reference: Around 100 scooters from all over the UK and Ireland travelled to Co Fermanagh this weekend, 70 years after the first Ulster Lambretta Club was formed.

source: Vienas iš dviejų pirmojo klubo narių Chrisas Wilsonas 1966-aisias įsigijo pirmąją „Lambretta“ už maždaug 40 £.
translation_clean: One of the two members of the first club, Chris Wilson, bought the first "Lambretta" in 1966 for approximately £40.
reference: Chris Wilson, one of two members of the original club, bought his first Lambretta for around £40 in 1966.

source: „Man motoroleris buvo tik transporto priemonė, bet sužinojau, kad galiu panaudoti jį ir kitaip.
translation_clean:
My motorcycle was just a means of transportation, but I found out that I can use it in other ways."

Note: This translation is a direct translation of the given Lithuanian text. If you'd like a more idiomatic translation, it could be:

"My motorcycle was just a mode of transportation, but I discovered its other uses."

Or, in a more conversational tone:

"My motorcycle was just for getting around, but I learned it can be used for more than that.
reference: "A scooter was just to me a form of transport, but then there was the option to use it for other things.

source: Tai buvo šioks toks sportas.
translation_clean: This was such a sport.
reference: It was a bit of sport.

source: Neįsitraukiau į modų kultūrą, o dabar turbūt esu tam per senas“, – sakė jis.
translation_clean: "I didn't get involved in the mod culture, and now I'm probably too old for it," – he said.
reference: I never did get into the mod scene and I'm probably far too old now for it," he said.

source: „Jis buvo gana pigus ir gana patikimas, jį galėjai įsigyti už prieinamą kainą, o įsigijęs nuveikti ką nors daugiau, nei tik nuvažiuoti iš taško A į tašką B.“
translation_clean:
The translation of the Lithuanian text to English is:

"He was quite cheap and quite reliable, you could buy him for a reasonable price, and after buying, you could do something more than just drive from point A to point B."

Note: The word "jis" in the text refers to a car, as the context suggests that the speaker is talking about a vehicle.
reference: Basically it was relatively cheap, relatively reliable and they were available for the right amount of money and once you had one there were other things you could do with it other than just riding from A to B.

source: Jis dalyvaudavo „Lambretta“ atskiro starto lenktynėse Meno salos TT žiede.

reference: He used to race Lambrettas in time trials around the TT circuit on the Isle of Man.

source: Pirmasis Alsterio „Lambretta“ klubas įkurtas 8-ojo dešimtmečio pradžioje ir pertvarkytas prieš 12 metų.
translation_clean: The first Alsterio "Lambretta" club was established at the beginning of the 8th decade and reorganized 12 years ago.
reference: The first Ulster Lambretta Club wound up in the early 1970s but it was reformed 12 years ago.

source: „Apie 1971 m. motoroleriai ir kitos transporto formos vis mažiau domino žmones, be to, klubai apskritai nukentėjo dėl neramumų, todėl pagalvojau: „Viskas, tai galas“, – sakė Chrisas.
translation_clean: "About 1971, motorcyclists and other forms of transportation were of less interest to people, and besides, clubs in general suffered due to the unrest, so I thought: 'It's all over', – said Chris."
reference: "It started to die out around 1971, the interest in scooters, other forms of transport and the Troubles didn't help with clubs in general, so I thought, 'No that's it, finished'," Chris said.

source: „Tada kažkuriuo laiku vėl atsirado susidomėjimas ir, panašu, jis vis labiau augo.“
translation_clean:
The translation of the given Lithuanian text to English is:

"Then at some point interest arose again, and it seemed to be growing stronger."
reference: And then sometime back there were showings of the interest in it and it seems to have grown and grown.

translation_clean: Philipas Steele'as is the secretary of the Alsterio "Lambretta" club, currently having 97 members, responsible for membership.

source: „Visų motyvai skirtingi.

The translation of the Lithuanian text is:

"All motivations are different."

translation_clean: There are also those who are simply interested in the wine.

source: Daugelis motorolerių modifikuoti, todėl dviejų vienodų nėra.

reference: Many of the scooters have been customised and no two are the same.

source: Galima nekeisti motorolerio ir ramiai važiuoti 35 ar 40 mylių per valandą greičiu, pritaikytu siauroms Italijos gatvelėms, tačiau kai kurie nariai tai patobulino.

source: Ir nors Šiaurės Airijos orai ne visada tokie malonūs kaip „Lambretta“ tėvynės Italijos, šįkart Fermanos apygardoje važinėjantiems motoroleriams švietė saulė.
